item.title: [ Leetcode 133 ] Clone Graph | Solution Approach & Explanation
item.description: The task is to clone a graph, but we cannot directly return the pointer to the original graph. LinküîóÔºöhttps://leetcode.com/problems/clone-graph/ Solution - DFS This problem is essentially about using DFS to traverse the entire graph and clone all the nodes. The main challenge is where to store the cloned nodes during the DFS traversal. Design of the visit map If we use the usual vector to track visited nodes, we will only know if a node has been visited but not where the cloned node is.
